name: TheDadNotesProject
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Based on his book of handwritten notes to his daughter, Chris Yandle launched 'The Dad Notes Project' to share words of encouragement and life lessons with parents and others.
